tool_description: Remove Background from Images & Download, simpleish.io
name: Simpleish.io
title: Simpleish.io

api_list.name: remove_background
api_list.description: Remove image background according to given parameters.

optional_parameters.name: source_image_file
optional_parameters.default: Source image file. Support only PNG, JPG, JPEG. use only only one source image parameter

optional_parameters.name: source_image_base64
optional_parameters.default: Source image base64 format. Support only PNG, JPG, JPEG. use only only one source image parameter

optional_parameters.name: source_image_url
optional_parameters.default: Source image url. Support only PNG, JPG, JPEG. use only only one source image parameter
